forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Sunny then Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered rain showers between 2pm and 5pm, then scattered showers and thunderstorms. Sunny. High near 88, with temperatures falling to around 85 in the afternoon. West wind 2 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then scattered showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 11pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 65. West northwest wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 86, with temperatures falling to around 84 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 62. Northeast wind 2 to 7 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
